text: geudaeneun geudeul-i jeojileun geos-i geudeul-ege dagchyeoolila dulyeowo ha neun joeindeul-eul boge doelila geuleona mid-eum-eulo seon-eul haenghaneun jadeul-eun cheon gug-ui mogjang-eseo geudeul-i wonhaneun mo deun geos-eul geudeul-ui junimgwa deobul-eo man kkighage doelini geugeos-i hananim-ui keuna keun eunhyeila
